short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send HTTP Requests and inspect their responses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send HTTP requests and inspect their responses

Currently supported features

- Request history
- HTTP Methods: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD
- HTTP Headers
- URL Search Params
- Basic Auth
- Bearer Token Auth
- API Key Auth
- Preview the HTTP Message
- Response Body, Headers, Status Code, and time

Features Coming Soon

- Additional authorization schemes 
- Request Collections
- More 

To report a bug or to request a new feature please visit https://github.com/theogainey/ResponseHub and open an issue.
